symptoms.name: High temperature
symptoms.pattern: Present during the first 3 weeks of illness

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.pattern: Present during the first 3 weeks of illness

symptoms.name: Sore limbs
symptoms.pattern: Present during the first 3 weeks of illness

symptoms.name: Difficulty breathing
symptoms.pattern: May be present with inflamed lungs

symptoms.name: Chest pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present with inflamed lungs

risk_factors: Exposure to contaminated water and soil (Asia, Australia, Africa)
